resources.string: The Islamic Centre of Waterloo (ICW) aims to cater to Waterloo’s diverse Muslim Community. Located in the Laurelwood area, the ICW is surrounded by over 200 Muslim families and aims to be the centre of this growing community. The ICW is situated on 3 acres of land and has the space required to address the needs of the community in the present and the future insha’Allah.​​​​​​
